text: Dione Alex Veroneze (born 16 December 1990), known as Bateria, is a Brazilian futsal player who plays for FS Cartagena and the Brazilian national futsal team as a winger. ==References== ==External links== *Liga Nacional Fútbol Sala profile Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian men's futsal players
title: Bateria (futsal player)
